which do you prefer? tell us why!
i would say starbursts!!! i dont know really why but i dont really care for skittles emoticon_cool
They are both great, but I'd have to go with skittles. They seem to have more flavor and you can pop a lot in your mouth at once :).

MMMM...Starburst...MMM...Skittles... Why don't they make a candy thats a combination of them? I mean, they're both fruity... But having to make a choice, I would say Starburst by far. For a few reasons
 1) If anyone wants some of your candy, you can give them ONE wrapped starburst vs. a HANDFULL of skittles
 2)If you don't want to eat them all at the same time, you don't have to! It is so hard to keep skittles in their bag... maybe they should be resealable too.
 3)Sometimes the candy coating on skittles is simply annoying to my teeth.
 4)I'm just rambling on now, but did I at least make some sort of point? :)
 
 -KaiRakasha

neither. i cant stand any kind of sticky candy (caramel included)
 
 chocolate is near perfect :)
Hmm, Joosters I suppose are starburst, but I was tempted to go with the Opal fruits anyway (why did you make us change the name, why?)
did anyone see the new starburst commercial about the boy that tried to impress this girl he likes by making a sculpture of her out of starbust pieces? that sh!t is hilarious!! omg!!

Now it comes to it, anyone heard of a game called 'Darkend Skye', computer game that seems to based entirely on the old skittles adverts (one where the wizard seems goes to the edge of a cliff and skittles fall from a rainbow). Anyone know if the game is just ripping off a few free cutscenes or was in some bizzare way linked in to a subtle unadvertised marketing scheme?

SKITTLES!! There is no candy quite like skittles. They are fruity, small, and portable. It doesn't matter whether or not you can save them for later, because you won't want to! They're too irresistable. Another thing, you don't have to spend ten years trying to chew one skittle, it takes a minute to eat a whole handful. Someday, after the candy wars, there will be only one fruit candy, and it will be Skittles!

Now -n- Laters!!!

 
 Yes, those are good.

Skittles < Starburst.
 
 Skittles: 
 More of them (smaller)
 can hold some in your hand and look at handfuls of their colorful goodness.
 Chewy but not too chewy.
 A candy shell and chewy inside
 
 Starburst:
 Paper that interferes with how fast you can cram them all in your mouth.
 You can end up with 4 orange and 3 lemon in a single pack :/
 (when strawberry is the best flavor)
 
 -Mach

Off topic but I get excited talking about food:
 
 Favorite evil candy:
 Lindor White Chocolate Truffles - Insanely good. If you haven't had one, eat one now. You can get them all over, even at Target (In a creme bag).
 
 Second fav evil candy:
 Plain old cadburry creme eggs, the big ones. Creamy goodness.
 -=----
 
 Best Store bought dessert:
 Edwards Key Lime Pie
 OMG, I use to eat the whole pie in two days, now I never eat them because I eat healthy and would not be able to resist eating the whole thing, but oh do I miss 'em and have fond memories.
 
 Best chain restaurant dessert:
 Two Rows (bar and grill and restaurant):
 Tequilla Bread Pudding - Better IMO than a good cheesecake (and cheescakes are evil good too).
 
 -Mach

I would have to say Starburst by far.....
 
 1) You don't feel as big of a pig after you eat a littles stick instead of that bag.
 
 2) As previously stated you can get away with just giving one starburst instead of a handful of skittles to friends.
 
 3) Although I use to love skittles it made my teeth hurt and left a weird aftertaste.
 
 Also you can make a lot of cool stuff with the wrappers and the starburst too.

Sadly Homer's dream of Skittlebrew doesn't work, at least in cider...the colours all come off and make it taste wierd, and the small white blobs at the bottom look horrible. Still, can't waste alcohol....though might try it with beer at somepoint.
well im all for skittles, they are the s*** especially when frozen.
Skittles all the way. I haven't had starburst in years, besides they used to give me the runs.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  starburst or skittles?
